title: Push and update files in GitHub
author: n8n Team
readme:
This workflow performs various Git operations. It starts with a manual trigger, sets the local repository path, decodes a file and then updates a file's content, adds, commits, and pushes changes to a GitHub repository, and finally pulls changes.

The upper branch of the workflow retrieves a specific file ("[README.md](http://README.md)") from a GitHub repository ("git_push_article") owned by "teds-tech-talks." It then decodes the file's binary data into readable text using a code node. The decoded content is used to update the file by adding a timestamp and data. Finally, the modified file is pushed back to the repository using a GitHub node, completing the process of editing and updating the file directly via the workflow.

This bottom branch of the workflow makes changes to a local Git repository. It starts by updating the "[README.md](http://README.md)" file with a timestamp and some content. Then, it adds the modified files, commits the changes with a message, and pushes them to a remote GitHub repository owned by "teds-tech-talks." Additionally, the workflow allows pulling changes from the remote repository into the local repository. The goal is to demonstrate how to perform various Git operations using n8n nodes, including adding, committing, pushing, and pulling changes.
readme_zh:
此工作流执行多种Git操作。流程始于手动触发，设置本地仓库路径后，先解码文件并更新文件内容，随后执行添加、提交变更至GitHub仓库的操作，最后拉取更新。

工作流的上半部分分支从"teds-tech-talks"持有的"git_push_article"仓库获取特定文件（"[README.md](http://README.md)"）。通过代码节点将文件的二进制数据解码为可读文本后，使用时间戳和新增内容更新该文件。最终借助GitHub节点将修改后的文件推送回原仓库，完整实现了通过工作流直接编辑更新文件的全过程。

下半部分分支主要针对本地Git仓库进行变更操作：先用时间戳和内容更新"[README.md](http://README.md)"文件，随后添加修改文件、提交变更信息并推送至"teds-tech-talks"持有的远程GitHub仓库。该工作流还支持将远程仓库变更拉取至本地，旨在演示如何运用n8n节点完成包括添加、提交、推送及拉取等系列Git操作。
